title: Breaking Down the Jon Gruden Report From a Player Perspective
description:
Jason, James, and Ryan start by discussing the fallout after it was revealed that former Las Vegas Raiders coach Jon Gruden was sending racist, homophobic, and misogynistic emails. Then they discuss Lamar Jackson’s incredible performance against the Colts on 'Monday Night Football'. Lastly, they finish up by checking in on who they think are the best teams in the NFL a month into the season.

Hosts: Jason Goff, James Jones, and Ryan Shazier
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
